body.name: GlowShift GPS Speedometer Sensor Adapter Kit for Speedometer Gauges - Antenna Installs to Roof or on Trunk
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 30 mins
features: GlowShift GPS Speedometer Sensor Allows Users to View Their Vehicle’s Driving Speed Without the Need for a Lengthy Installation Process
Compatible with Any GlowShift Speedometer Gauge
Features GPS Antenna with 6-1/2' of Wire, GPS Sensor, GPS Signal Harness with 1' of Wire - Antenna Installs to the Roof or Top of the Trunk
GlowShift Guarantee with One Year Limited Warranty & Free Lifetime Technical Support

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GlowShift’s GPS Speedometer Sensor Kit allows you to easily install an aftermarket speedometer and monitor your vehicle’s driving speed without the need for a lengthy installation process. This GPS speedometer sensor kit allows for a quick connection to any GlowShift Speedometer Gauge. The GPS Antenna measures 1-3/8" x 1-7/8" and can be installed anywhere on the vehicle with a clear line of sight to the sky such as the roof, dashboard or on top of the trunk. Going through any enclosed areas such as tunnels or garages will obstruct and drop the signal until the antenna is clear once again. Please also be sure to set the back of the GlowShift Speedometer to #3 to acquire the appropriate signal from the GPS Speedometer Adapter.

The GPS Antenna comes with 6.5’ of wire. Also included is a 1' GPS Signal Harness that connects to the GPS Sensor and to a 12 volt power source, engine ground source and speedometer signal source from the gauge. GlowShift makes the process easy with installation instructions to walk you through the process step-by-step.

Wiring for Installation 6.5’ of Wire for GPS Antenna1’ of Wire for GPS Signal Harness3’ Wire Has Power, Ground, Signal WiresPlug and Play Connectivity Roof Installation Ensure Area is UnobstructedClean and Prep the SurfaceAdhere the AntennaRoute the Antenna Wire Trunk Installation Confirm Clear Line of Sight to SkyConnect Antenna Wire to ControllerDo Not Bend or Pinch Antenna WireSecure Controller in Dry Location

Who We Are GlowShift is your source for cutting-edge aftermarket automotive products specially designed for cars and trucks. Our diverse lineup includes a variety of gauges, gauge pods, and gauge accessories such as adapters, sensors, wiring harnesses and much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with autometer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item to use with my electric auto meter gauge. It works perfectly just one minor detail the directions state that when receiving power, you will see a colorful LED after calling customer service they tell me that it no longer does that so it’s just plug and play

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does just what it's supposed to do and does it simply...
reviews.reviewText: Does just what it's supposed to do and does it simply...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked with Autometer Invision
reviews.reviewText: Paired well with an Autometer Invision gauge assembly for a 73 K-10 after calibrating it. Save money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works okay after fine tuning.
reviews.reviewText: I've tried 2 of these units. 1st one didn't work at all, second one was either over 10 miles or under 10 miles per hour. Instructions were missing from second set. You have to select your option on the back, then there is an adjustment screw as well to narrow down the speed closer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy solution to gauge swap
reviews.reviewText: Swapped out old gauges to Autometer digital in a squarebody c10. Saved a little money by using a different brand. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save the money
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t matter where I mount the gps unit it reads 10-15 mph faster than I’m going I’ve tired it for about 100 miles hasn’t gotten any better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price! Small size, highly accurate and compatible!
reviews.reviewText: I really love the small size. The all-in-one alternatives were not something I wanted to have visible. The antenna is about industry size so I am able to hide it well but still he a clear signal. The sensor is tiny and can be placed anywhere which I like. It has an indicator light as well. The pulse output is around 8k, I am using an intellitronix digital cluster I bought years back. Stock setting is 8k for input, I didn't have to adjust a thing! Their customer support is quick to reply. That sold me as well. Price, size, ease of install and compatibility! Perfect!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Wish they would make these electric boxes a bit better. Very sensitive. You can't buy these in separate pieces although these are two pieces.
